OrderOwnerSharingRule.name: OrderOwnerSharingRule
OrderOwnerSharingRule.description: Represents a rule which determines order sharing access for the orderâ€™s owners.

CreatedById.description: ID of the creator of the order owner sharing rule.

CreatedDate.description: Date when the order owner sharing rule was created.

Description.description: Description of the order owner sharing rule. Maximum length is 1,000 characters.

DeveloperName.description: Name of the developer of the order owner sharing rule.

GroupId.description: ID of the group whose orders are shared.

Id.description: ID of the order owner sharing rule.

LastModifiedById.description: ID of the user who last modified the order owner sharing rule.

LastModifiedDate.description: Date when the order owner sharing rule was last modified.

Name.description: Name of the order owner sharing rule. Maximum length is 80 characters.

OrderAccessLevel.description: Access level for the order owner sharing rule.

SystemModstamp.description: System modification time for the order owner sharing rule.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the user or group with whom order access is shared.
